title: Face with Stuck-Out Tongue and Winking Eye

verbs: Show mirth by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face and emission of sounds.

To show mirth, satisfaction, or derision, by peculiar movement of the muscles of the face, particularly of the mouth, causing a lighting up of the face and eyes, and usually accompanied by the emission of explosive or chuckling sounds from the chest and throat; to indulge in laughter.

description:
A yellow face sticking out its tongue and making a zany wink, usually shown with its right eye closed and left wide open. Often conveys a sense of fun, excitement, wackiness, buffoonery, or joking.

Generally goofier than üòõ Face With Tongue and üòù Squinting Face With Tongue but less "crazy" than ü§™ Zany Face.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the winking face with tongue emoji is a vibrant burst of playful mischief, characterized by its bright yellow sphere and bold, cheerful expression. A single eye is playfully winked shut, while the other gazes directly, framed by subtle shading that gives it a lively dimensionality. The tongue, a bright red curve, juts out cheekily, enhanced by Apple's smooth gradients and realistic lighting to appear almost tactile and full of lighthearted fun. This emoji is perfect for conveying a sense of jest, lighthearted teasing, or a shared inside joke among friends on Apple devices.
